DataElement.preferredName: Tumor Identifier Domain Disease Progression Radiograph Image Appearance Type Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Specific description of the appearance of recurrent disease/progressive disease as seen on radiographic images.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Tumor Identifier Domain Disease Progression Radiograph Image Appearance Type
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A domain that represents the data that uniquely identifies tumors._The worsening of a disease over time._An image produced on a radiosensitive surface by x-ray radiation that has penetrated and passed through a structure._Any record of an imaging event whether physical or electronic._The outward or visible aspect of a person or thing._Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A domain that represents the data that uniquely identifies tumors.

Concepts.definition: A domain that represents the data that uniquely identifies tumors.

Property.preferredName: Disease Progression Radiograph Image Appearance Type
Property.preferredDefinition: The worsening of a disease over time.:An image produced on a radiosensitive surface by x-ray radiation that has penetrated and passed through a structure.:Any record of an imaging event whether physical or electronic.:The outward or visible aspect of a person or thing.:Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

Concepts.definition: A process that manifests as the worsening of a disease over time.
An image produced on a radiosensitive surface by x-ray radiation that has penetrated and passed through a structure.
Any record of an imaging event whether physical or electronic.
The outward or visible aspect of a person or thing.
Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
